channel.title: Hidden admin? rep++!
channel.description: kk On my server, I have used another guys source for a base, and when i set rights to 4 on a char, it has hidden admin rights, but it has the same crown as a mod, so sorta defeats the purpose of having hidden staff if they show as a mod... how can i fix this? thanx for reading

item.title: Hidden admin? rep++!
